BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Nicholas A. LaPorte, Jr. to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his reappointment to the New York City Civil Service Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 813 of the City Charter.
